'''Phosphoros' Guidance''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[The Light of Day]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Seelie]] in [[Enkanomiya]] to their Seelie Courts.

==Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* {{w|Phosphorus (morning star)|Phosphorus}} {{Lang|el=Φωσφόρος|el_rm=Phōsphoros}} is the personification of Venus as the {{w|Morning Star}} in Greek classical mythology. Its counterpart, {{w|Hesperus}}, is Venus as the Evening Star, and is referenced in the achievements named [[Hesperus' Boons]].
* The name may also originate from the literal meaning of phosphorus, meaning "light bringing."
